simChef 0.0.1

    • Parallel strategies in `simChef`

R6 class representing a simulation experiment.

Experiment.Rd

A simulation experiment with any number of DGPs, Methods, Evaluators, and Visualizers.

Details

When run, an Experiment seamlessly combines DGPs and Methods, computing results in parallel. Those results can then be evaluated using Evaluators and visualized using Visualizers.

Public fields

name

The name of the Experiment.
